command.description: Sets background color of the screen to that represented by index.
command.help: Parameters: index - Sets the screen's background color to the color at the given index.

command.description: Sets color of the pen to that represented by index.
command.help: Parameters: index - Sets the pen's color to the color at the given index.

command.description: Sets shape of turtle to that represented by index.
command.help: Parameters: index - Sets the turtle's shape to the shape at the given index.

command.description: Sets color at given index to given r g b color values.
command.help: Parameters: index r g b - Sets a custom color at the given index using RGB values.

command.description: Sets size of the pen to be pixels thickness.
command.help: Parameters: pixels - Sets the thickness of the pen.
Parameters: none - Returns the index of the current pen color.
Parameters: none - Returns the index of the current turtle shape.
